explains: n. 主权，统治权；支配；领土

sentences.en: Man has dominion over the natural world.
sentences.cn: 人类拥有对自然界的统治权。

sentences.en: I think dominion is also having a sense of responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我认为统治也包含着一种责任感。

sentences.en: The republic is a dominion of the Brazilian people.
sentences.cn: 该共和国的领土属于全体巴西人民。
